website_summaries.verdict: This sports bra is best for smaller chested women who don't need maximum support when working out.
pros: Distances itself from competitors for its unique design with a sport racer back and a stylish crop top front
cons: Fuller chested women caution that this bra isn't the most supportive and may not be the best choice for higher impact activities

customer_reviews.title: Fits a bigger breast
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cotton bra to lounge in that fits a bigger breast. Needed one for sleep and have tried tons with no luck. This one fits great, at this price it cannot be beat. Will be buying more. I am a 34G and Ordered a L.
customer_reviews.author: ElAce

customer_reviews.title: 42DD and love them!
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried them on, I thought no way but after washing them I wore the black one all day today and loved it. I wear a 42DD and am 64 years old so I'm asking a lot from these poor bras but they did it. My breast were fully covered, in the right place and very comfortable. I was shocked to realize that at one point I truly did think I forgot to put a bra on because it was so comfortable. I'd have no problem wearing these at any time and any where in casual clothes. Very happy with purchase and I'll be back for more!
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not Hanes, Cheaply Made, Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: These run small. 58% cotton, 37% polyester, 5% spandex. Made in India. I think it's odd that there is no Hanes logo or wording on the bras themselves - but there is wording tags that reads Hanes, still no logo. Are these really made by Hanes?
customer_reviews.author: Abby Normal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: 38 d, ordered large. Fits perfect. Fits like a sports bra just a little less support. Doesn't have the uniboob effect a lot of sports bras do.
customer_reviews.author: MindNumbDumplin

customer_reviews.title: Badly mis-sized
customer_reviews.text: According to the size chart, I should have ordered a size small (I wear a 36C). I said 'no way' and ordered medium. I received the order, and promptly returned it because it was so small. I then ordered size large. It fits terribly snug, and when you sweat, it is nearly impossible to get off. It also does not keep my breasts in the position that I want them.
customer_reviews.author: N. Case

customer_reviews.title: Sizechart on bras received does not match product listing page size chart
customer_reviews.text: Notice on the size chart on the bras I received that 2X and 3X end at C cup and not at DD cup as on this order page. I don't know if I was sent outdated stock or if this order page should be updated with a new size chart. If these were the right size they look like they could be nice where at home bras which is what I was looking for but shoving DD into a C space just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Karon

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: These are soft and good stretch for a cotton sport bra. It has a extra layer of cloth in the front for those fridgid moments when your body does whatever it wants too. I would not do any serious exercise in it as it does not offer great enough support for that, except walking. Since i have been tellecommuting I am not wearing bras usual on a daily basis. I wear size two x tshirt and 42D bra. I am comfortable in this to wear around the house and quick errand trips. I think this is gonna be my new normal.
customer_reviews.author: nymcharles

customer_reviews.title: These are horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a small or medium in the Hanes nylon bras that are similar. I purchased a medium in these (I'm a 34D/DD) and these are TOO TIGHT - holy heck, there's no spandex in here. Total tight sports bra feeling with no give and UNIBOOB. These are awful. I wanted a light cotton bra that I could wear in 90+ weather that would breathe. It is not these. I hate them, I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Same old favorite go-to comfy bra!
customer_reviews.text: 35" bust (34C), and got a size small. Other reviews were complaining there was no branding on the inside, but I believe my store-bought ones were the same. My favorite comfy bra!! No padding, just a double layer, so if I wear it to work I wear something loose and patterned haha! But this is my classic bra and t-shirt weekend wear! Ones sent to me were good as always! Eventually the spandex in the band wears out and it becomes less supportive overall (after a good chunk of time), but maybe it would last even longer if I didn't dry them on high heat all the time...😅 My pic is after several washes FYI!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Misleading and not true to size
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT the brand ‘Hanes.’ Not sure why the seller is misleading customers regarding brand, but if you’re expecting Hanes, you’ll be disappointed. These are generic sports bras and they have the strangest odor! They came packaged in one plastic bag together, but the blue one had tags and the gray one did not. I’m not sure if these are returns but I suspect that’s the case. While the band size is fined the cup size is inaccurate. Order a size up. The quality of these is similar to what one would find in a dollar store. I wouldn’t purchase again, mostly due to the misleading brand.
customer_reviews.author: Living_Lime_Green

customer_reviews.title: Lower band is uncomfortably tight...but ordering a size (or two) up solves that problem.
customer_reviews.text: These are good bras. They're softer on the outside than the inside, so I wear them inside out. Also, while I usually wear a medium (and can manage in a small) in the pullover style, I opted for the XL (!) in this bra, as the lower band is uncomfortably snug otherwise. (I tried the medium...and then the large...and finally settled on the XL.) The band on the XL is actually a bit too big (at least for someone who usually wears a medium) -- but better that than too small. Upshot: a good purchase but order at least one size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Dang these are comfortable. Not tons of support, but then I don't need it (ahem). I wear it instead of a bra if I'm just running errands, etc., because who needs to be uncomfortable? I really like them and I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium based on the sizing chart they provided however it was too small and very tight. I then ordered a size large and it was much more comfortable. These are great for just doing normal everyday activities or walking. I love the idea of the racer back however time and time again the strap going toward the back seems to cause my trapezoids to tense up. I think this has to do with the fact that I am a D cup. The weight on the straps digs into my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Peddler

customer_reviews.title: It keeps the twin monsters in place
customer_reviews.text: I placed "somewhat small" because I always order one size smaller so the damn things on my chest stay in place. So I got Large instead if XL. The good thing, is VERY comfortable and I'm not gasping for air as I walk by (unlike other brands). The twin monsters stay in place - tight and with no movement - and I can breath happily. I'm ordering more, since I hate stupid bras. I'm happy I found something that is smooth and very comfortable. 5 stars for you! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: ShinFuranSan

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. They seem fit so comfortably for every day. I bought some earlier from a store and I did buy 2x when I normally wear XL. They fit so much better just a little bigger. So far seem to wash up fine. Probably not good for over B cup, but for those that size and smaller, a really comfortable casual bra. I take leaving reviews seriously. I read customer reviews to help me decide what purchases to make. I only leave positive reviews for good products. If you find this review helpful please let me know by selecting “YES” where asked below “Was this review helpful to you?”
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, I’m a 34C and I got them in a medium. I wear these for working out and just for lounging around the house, they are definitely supportive enough for a sport bra and comfortable. It’s not like other sport bras where they are so tight you can’t wait to take it off, but it’s also not flimsy or too stretchy. It looks cute too, it’s doesn’t look like a granny bra, I’m 29, so I can vouch, if you’re younger and you’re worried about that, no, it looks cute on.
customer_reviews.author: Faye A. Falzone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Breathable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a hiking trip in New Zealand. Some brands charge $30 for a pair of breathable underwear. These work just as well but so much cheaper. Very comfortable and helped the sweat escape.
customer_reviews.author: Chsgrl76

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable and easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable bras I have ever worn. I am absolutely thrilled that they not only fit perfectly, but are affordable. I have even slept in them. I can't say enough about how much I like them. I'll be ordering more for sure. The only negative I have is that the colors are limited to grey and white. The smaller sizes have many beautiful colors and it would be great if the larger sizes would also have a wider assortment of colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product and sizes are too small
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it that I cannot choose what colors I would like in a package. Also the sizes are too small. Which is not understandable as I was wearing large and then lost 30 pounds so ordered large again figuring that would fit. But it's still way too tight (I weigh 118 pounds and they aren't that big!) and the materials they use either colors or dyes or some chemical is in the fabric and does not get washed out over many washes and causes irritation with itching and rash under the bra on the back by the scapulas. I have stopped wearing these and now the irritation clears up. I will not buy Hanes product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Size up... I am normally a 36B and got a medium, but it’s snug. I’m looking forward to it stretching out. Wish i wouldve gotten a large. This helps with reducing the headlights, but they’d still be visible through a sheer shirt. These are only about camisole-thickness. Also, there’s no Hanes logo anywhere on these. Tag, printed on the bras... nowhere. Not that it matters to me, but FYI.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: not like they used to make them
customer_reviews.text: I used to like the Hanes pullover bra. But whatever they did in the past years, they changed the formula (possibly when they changed ingredients from cotton to "comfort blend"). The material changed. It's less stretchy, less forgiving. I still got my old ones, they were just worn too much so I hoped to replace them. For the new ones, I got large size and they are too tight circumference wise. I compensated and got x-large, but those are only a tiny amount more giving. I have a hard time pulling these off me at the end of the day. (BMI index 24-25 aka just barely overweight)
customer_reviews.author: Germ

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, sizing is off, buy larger
customer_reviews.text: I don't see brand Hanes anywhere on the bra. Makes me think the item is marketed under the name of Hanes but is actually mass produced for all kinds of sales outlets. Cotton is important for me. Synthetic is very "skin" hugging. Design is comfortable for slow exercise (not much jumping), walking, lounging around and sleeping. Slight elasticity is snug but does not restrict. Size is definitely off. I read other reviews and bought large instead of medium. Usually, I'm a 36B and had bought medium before. No way. Sooo tight. Large hugs just nice. I will cold water wash in machine and hang dry. I would buy this again. Wish they had skin color. Too many whites are offered.
customer_reviews.author: Happyme

customer_reviews.title: I got small tittie's 🙄
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest this to Jesus's mom if she was around . It is so so comfortable . I am 5'2 weighing 150 . I ..am a 32b . I got a small and I am so impressed 🙌 . Pros : Comfortable ! Even for the itty bitty committee it still looks like I got something . While not showing to much . Honestly best bra I've ever put on Cons Your nipple is gonna show through the material so if u are going to the gym....keep in mind .
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product and charge for pick up unnecessarily.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Does not fit plus feels flimsy. And then they charge you for a special UPS pickup when UPS comes to this building every single day. Never buy from them again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small (and I've purchased Hanes before w/o incident); very, very, very thin and flimsy material. Doubt they would have lasted very long. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDi

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size Sent
customer_reviews.text: I always wear these, Iove em. The package arrived, I tore off the tags and went to put them in the hamper when I notice that they seemed little. So I checked the size and the large I ordered was actually a size medium. No way can I wear a medium. I removed the tags so I am stuck. Bummer! Went from the hamper to the trash. So disappointed. Be sure to check the size before removing tags.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Colclasure

customer_reviews.title: Great sport bras
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Easy to wear for good support with casual or dress outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Butt

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem to be the same quality as other Hanes I've bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Hanes pull on bra on Amazon, and it fits perfectly. I bought these (comes in a 2 pack) in the same size, but the fit is way too tight. Moreover, they seem to be cheaper quality. I would not recommend this product for those 2 reasons. Product did arrive quickly and was packed just fine.
customer_reviews.author: humboldt honey

customer_reviews.title: Seems fishy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure I got a knockoff. The name Hanes is nowhere to be found on the tags or on the bras themselves. The material is thin and flimsy and there’s almost no stretch. Smells strongly of rubber. And they are huge for the size they’re supposed to be. If this is an actual Hanes product, that’s sad. UPDATE: After several washings, these still smell weird. No support, even though they shrank considerably. I figured I could at least wear them to bed, but the elastic is itchy. I guess I’m pitching these in the trash. Be careful who you buy from. At least I didn’t get used ones, like some people did! Gag.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the same Hanes bras years ago and they were my favorites. When they started to lose their stretch (this is after about 10 years!) I started looking for replacements but nothing else seemed to fit right. One day I saw these on Amazon and decided to give them a try. I ordered XL because that's the size I had before (I'm 38B, but need a larger size because I have broad shoulders and rib cage). And they fit perfectly! These are so comfy--no chafing at the bottom or on the shoulders. The fabric is thick enough that nothing shows through when wearing a T shirt, yet is cool and comfortable. Amazon--don't ever stop carrying these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT SEAMLESS LINING.  VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: NOT SEAMLESS INSIDE, and sized extremely small. I'm a 34c. I ordered a large, and it barely fit over me, with stuff popping out the bottom of the cups. I should have listened to the other reviews on sizing. I would go with their get cozy bra if you want something comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Overby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these. So many sports bras have Nylon or Spandex that cause me irritation. These were such a disappointment. They were high in the back and ran about two sizes too small. I purposely get mine bigger to have some room, so I went up a size. It fit like a size down from my normal. The back was so incredibly uncomfortable. It had no stretch. Thank goodness I could return them!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Schieren

customer_reviews.title: SIZING TOTALLY OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so much to like these bras. They looked incredibly comfortable for around the house or running errands. Unfortunately, they were way too small. I ordered the L according to the size chart, and could not even get over my head. I am a 36/38 B or C depending on the brand. These seemed like a Junior type bra! May return for a larger size. I did like the all cotton.
customer_reviews.author: JByrd

customer_reviews.title: Smell something awful
customer_reviews.text: These have that awful chemically smell to them that new clothes have. The smell is awful and the thought of what is making them smell is even worse. I don’t even know if they fit yet, I just know they stink! I did not expect this from a Hanes cotton item :(
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a super-comfortable bra to wear at home, and this looked perfect! I ordered by the size chart, but that size was too tight to be comfortable. Amazon quickly sent a replacement, and now I wish I'd had these long ago! It's very comfortable, almost unnoticeable: I'm not constantly wiggling to reposition it, as I was with my other bras. My only negative is that it's not very flattering; instead, it's more FLATTENING. I'll take that, though, since I'm only wearing it in the house. Edited to add: I've been liking these so much I ordered another two-pack! So happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Baker Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not for busty ladies
customer_reviews.text: Well, after reading glowing reviews from blessed ladies I decided to try these. I'm a 40F generally and the XL size was in no way a good fit. The band was too big and the cup too small. The problem with these types of bras is that there is not enough room for the ladies to stay in the right spot, and no side support to keep them out of your armpit. I would not recommend unless you have very shapely assest already.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Product great but smelled
customer_reviews.text: These bras are great and I have ordered many times before so this rating is primarily for the seller or whoever packed it. The envelop smelled, the plastic it was wrapped in smelled, and the bras smelled extremely strongly of some perfumy smell! Since I knew they fit and I wanted them I had to take them and throw them straight into the washer to remove he smell. Thankfully it came out in the washing.
customer_reviews.author: laurs books

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but  for me...
customer_reviews.text: I have an autoimmune issue that leads to extremely sensitive skin. It is called dermatographia, or skin writing. Any scratch or pressure will lead to a red, painful welt that can last up to several hours. Mostly, I find these bras very comfortable, especially for nighttime or wearing around the house. I do wish that the chest band could be lined or lightly padded with a material even more soothing than the very nice cotton in the rest of the bra. However, if you do not have super sensitive skin, these are wonderful bras. Breathable and absorbing as only cotton can do.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Addington

customer_reviews.title: For lounge or sleeping only
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bras to be worn around the house and to sleep. They are good enough for those purposes, but would not be good for support or during any type of exercise. There isn't really any support and the material is really thin. I also think the size guide is way off. I am a 38DD and according to the size guide I should have been fine in an xl. I knew better, so I ordered an XXL and it fits well. I am satisfied with this purchase because I was looking for a simple lounge bra, but if you want a higher quality material or support, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.I.

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: These bras are not made by Hanes. The quality is awful, the fit is too small and for some bizarre reason they reek of perfume. The material is thin, not at all Hanes quality. I have Hanes sport bras and they all have the Hanes name stamped inside. The true Hanes sport bras are of good quality, the bras are nicely lined and fit true to size. The bras I received are very small and the fabric is very thin. Will be returning these ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: fuufuuberry

customer_reviews.title: SMALLER, TIGHTER than other hanes sport bras
customer_reviews.text: Beware when buying this item, as mine came from a seller that took a long time to ship, and when it arrived, I was disappointed that these are MUCH SMALLER than the size chart/description. I'm 5'3" at 102 lbs, and the SMALL size is too tight. I should also mention that this is thinner than expected. I wash all my other Hanes bras, so I expect this will have some shrinkage also, which means they would be Unwearable. And there's no free returns, so now I have to pay 30% of the cost of the item in shipping it back. Pain In The Behind!!!
customer_reviews.author: MissM

customer_reviews.title: strong chemical smell that stings
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying/wearing those bras for years. No problem until this batch. They sting with a strong chemical odor that didn't go away even after washing/drying. Sniffed the bras to determine where the odor came from and my nose and the skin around it burned for a long while afterward. I believe it is the elastic band. Had to return them. Hope Hanes is reading those reviews and fix this problem. For I will need to buy more soon.
customer_reviews.author: PickyShopper

customer_reviews.title: strange smell and too small
customer_reviews.text: Two things that strike me as strange: The sizing is way off - the medium really is like a small. The WORST smell. Like a disinfectant in the material. Even after washing it still smelled!!!! What are they treating these with!!! Not good for people who are chemically sensitive or don't want any strange odor on their clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Cammy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: If you’re wanting something that’s super basic- in between having a bra on/off style this is it. I’m stuck inside right now and I really don’t want to wear a bra but there are times I do migrate to the front yard for yard work and need something there. I have bras for everyday and sports bras meant for working out but who wants to wear those lounging in the house? No one. So I got these and I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: swarfield

customer_reviews.title: AHHHHmazing fit!!
customer_reviews.text: 46DD and I purchased a 3X. I bought these to sleep in as any woman this size knows one can be choking on the breasts as they move in every direction once we lie down. I don't ally have luck with bras so didn't put too much faith in these being a good fit; they are an amazing fit. Hold me snug but in no part do they pinch my back, under breast or under arms. I would not wear these under clothes outside, my size needs more solid coverage, but for around the house they are comfortalbe with just enough support. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.58

customer_reviews.title: Super Tiny, No Stretch
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate size chart. As a 36C, it recommends I wear a small. That didn’t seem right, so I got a medium. They are so tiny, I can’t even get them over my head! They don’t say Hanes anywhere, and are packaged in a plastic baggie. I seemed to get burned anytime I order clothing from Amazon. Giving these to my 12 year old niece.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: My go-to sports bra
customer_reviews.text: These cotton sports bras are much better and more comfortable than synthetic ones. Also, the shirring prevents "uni-boob." Unlike most sports bras, these don't have super thick straps, and consist of just two thin cotton layers, but they are still supportive (I'm a 36C). The overall look is natural, and they look good under tank tops. Good value to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Totally shocked by how comfy this is!
customer_reviews.text: I really had low expectations on these since they're so cheap but decided to take a chance. I prefer sports bras over standard bras so wear them daily expect when I need to look more decent than usual. I was surprised how nice these made my cleavage, tucked in my back fat, and felt against my skin. These wouldn't be the sports bras to rock while actually doing anything super active like running or tennis but for general comfy wear - they are fabulous! I am a 44DD and got the 3x and it fit perfect, not too tight and not too loose. I am going to order more now! Thanks, Hanes!
customer_reviews.author: april e, lofgren

customer_reviews.title: These are Cotton/Poly/Spandex - a little snug for an XL.
customer_reviews.text: Stretch Fit Bra fit as expected, but slightly tighter than cotton/spandex Hanes bras of the same style purchased previously. Intentionally ordered the grey/pink color because the fabric content for that combo was listed (like the ones I have) as having a higher cotton content and no polyester, but when the bras arrived, they have the same cotton/poly/spandex as all the others in the current description. I wear a 40B which would have been an L according to the Hanes chart. Glad I ordered the XL, because it is slightly snug. Flattering cut, soft fabric. Nice colors. Great price. Disappointed about the polyester.
customer_reviews.author: MGM

customer_reviews.title: Not Hanes
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this item expecting it actually be Hanes, even though the product is described as Hanes. The word Hanes was nowhere to be found on the item, the tags, or the packaging, and it reeks of a weird chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Franny1214

customer_reviews.title: Just the best
customer_reviews.text: I just love these. It is not tight across rib area which is what I wanted it for. I have recently starting having asthma and anything tight across this area makes it more difficult to breath. This does the trick. Give me uplift, but also stretches and gives so not to bind and make the breathing just as it should be. Sports bra. who knew. I know I didn't. I wear it with anything and everything and I am comfortable. I will buy more..
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Poor product for larger breasted women
customer_reviews.text: If you are a fan of the uni-boob look, this bra is for you. The material of this bra is very thin. Thinner than Haines underpants. Only the front is double layered. I would not be comfortable wearing this in public. There is a very strong perfume odor added to this product. Inexpensive but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Propette

customer_reviews.title: WAY too small
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if this is a good product, honestly or not. However, I measured myself and ordered in accordance with the size chart. It ran SO small. I am a chesty person but small petite stature, and I couldn't even get it over my shoulders...it was crazy how small this ran. Kind of wondering if they gave me the wrong size. Looks like it would fit a pre-teen. I didn't even try to get another size because it just was too small to even guess what size I would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite every day bra
customer_reviews.text: Old story about this bra... bought it years ago and found them now on Amazon! I love them! Probably the oldest thing in my drawer. They’re not padded but don’t show much nipple. After 2 kids they perk up my boobs I swear! I love this as an every day bra. It’s great support but not super running support. It doesn’t make you feel strangled and tight. They don’t give me back fat. I wear a 36-38B and I bought a Large. Fits perfect! They wash great and for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size 34b and I ordered this on a medium and large. There medium for a bit tight so I returned those but there large fits perfect. I love that it's double lined but thin enough you don't get warm. I like that it doesn't hold me in to tight. I use these as my home bras since it gives me no shape.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: True To Size and everyday, around the house comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Refer to the Hanes size chart, it is spot on. The Heather Grey and Denim Blue set arrived with a Special Value 2 pack $13.99 pre price tag and a tag stating that these are X-Temp Wicking and Cooling fabric. These casual lounge bras ARE lightweight and comfortable. The bottom band does roll, so I wouldn't recommend these for a "workout bra". Do not expect these to lift or separate - these are stretchy, 2 ply t shirt fabric weight, lounge cami bras; which is exactly what I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Joah Jung

customer_reviews.title: nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Usually I buy these at a different store but these are sold for less and with more sizes to choose from. The old bras were probably more than 8 or 10 years old and had seen better days so I threw them out. So I was glad I could buy the exact same ones I was replacing. I like the fact there is no wire or padding which I hate. It is often in the upper 90's to 105 degrees where I live, and padded bras are another unwanted layer to make me feel hotter than I want to be when I'm outside.
customer_reviews.author: MEV

customer_reviews.title: Smelled really bad! Don’t order!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened package I could smell the bras right away. Smelled like they had been stored in a Smokey room then sprayed with perfume to camouflage the smell. It was horrid! I tried them on while sneezing and the fit seemed fine. Threw them in washer as fast as I could. So I think they will be fine as long as the horrid smell comes out. Update: the smell did not come out after washing! I am returning. Would not buy from this seller. 😡
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I had several sleep bras that were literally falling apart and decided to try these. They appear to be well made and I like the cotton blend fabric. They do run small, I looked at the size chart and ordered the size that fit my measurements and ordered appropriately. I'm keeping them because I can get in them (and am hoping to lose weight LOL!) and they aren't too uncomfortable. I did re-order two sizes up so am hoping they will fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: pickyunee

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love these bras. I had gained a little weight since buying my last bras so these fit a tiny bit small. Nobodies fault. They are soft and gives more support than I thought. They're so comfy I hate to take them off. I just ordered 2 more. You will love these bras. Also, they are not padded. I hate padded bras. These are lined. They are not hot either. Nice bras for all year round.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H.

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is WRONG, as usual!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 bras that are 38C, 1 40 C. According to the chart, Large should be more than adequate. I can't even get it over my shoulders! I am sick of these imported clothes mislabeling the sizing. I take measurements! Get real...everybody is complaining about the sizing of all clothes bought on line. Hanes should be trustworthy. I hope it isn't a cynical thing about nobody will bother to send them back...we can misrepresent and never have any consequences. I've bought Hanes for decades....and more than disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kelsay

customer_reviews.title: Ok- not the best
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, and as expected. I bought a Medium, and these fit somewhat comfortably during the first few wears, then after about the fourth wash in cold water, it started fitting very tightly, especially near the rib cage. Additionally, I run frequently during my work out and they were not that efficient in terms of keeping my 34C boobs in place. The shape of my nipples are also a little transparent through these (no, they're not pointy :-)). It is not the best sports bra in terms of concealing under-arm sweat either. I would only purchase these again if money is tight, and I'm in need of a quick shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kay J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sports Bras
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying more of these sports bras because they are so comfortable, sort and great to wear. These bras are more comfortable than my other sports bras. I hate regular bras and love how these sports bra fit. Very soft and comfortable/look very nice! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Soft, breathable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these cotton bras for anyone who doesn't like the binding feel of other bras. I've purchased these same bras three times over the last eight years and expect to never buy another type of bra again. I am a size M/L and purchase the XL size so that they fit more like a snug camisole. Very very comfortable and breathable. Likely not enough support for vigorous exercise but perfect for everyday comfort. Plus they are made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Wilder Colorado

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I wanted. I was looking for a sleeping bra to give a little extra support to the ladies without feeling super tight or chaffy. These are nice and soft and give just enough support without feeling like a boob is going to slip out but not making a uniboob either. I typically wear a small in shirts and sports bras and I ordered a medium to ensure a looser fit and they’re a perfect size. For reference, I’m 5’6” 135 pounds and 34B bra. I washed them before I wore them and they did shrink a little but nothing a wear or two won’t fix. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: JTHB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training bra
customer_reviews.text: Great starter bra. Both my daughters used these as their first bra and they loved them. Soft and comfortable. Don’t be fooled by the adult sizes. A woman’s small is the equivalent to a kids 14. Fantastic fit and they feel like they are wearing a real bra. They go under all types of clothes too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pasteur

customer_reviews.title: SIZING CHART IS WAY OFF!
customer_reviews.text: According to size chart on Amazon, I should fit a large... According to the TAG on the items, I need an XL bordering on a 2X. It is impossible to see this tag until you buy the items and find out the hard way that the two size charts available do not match and the items will be way to small. Cheap crap.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Not true sizing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in sizing. Regularly wear a 34 and their sizing stated a small fits 34-36. Look at the photo. It measures 10” across for a total of 20”. Getting it on was a struggle and almost had to have my daughter come over to help me get it off! Returned it and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Mathieson

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfy bra.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear around the house and although I went a size up, they just weren't comfortable. The elastic around the ribcage is too strong. It stretched over my head and shoulders but when it bounced back to my ribcage it was tight and uncomfortable. This is not a heavy support bra. It's just a nice thick cotton but the elastic ruined it for me. I have it to my 15 year old who normally wears a small and she said it fit "fine." So at least it didn't have to return them
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Description
customer_reviews.text: The description for the Blue colored bra state 95% Cotton & 5% Spandex, but the bra itself reads 56% Cotton/38% Polyester/6% Spandex. It's a little scratchy and some of the seam sewing is questionable. I will wash on of the bra to see if he holds up and gets a little softer. If not, I may have to return. But will wait to see because the style is good and the price fits my budget. I'll update soon..
customer_reviews.author: JFW

customer_reviews.title: Very very comfortable and breathable
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for these kind of bras for a long time. Fruit of the loom used to make them with the Shire good front. Now they make them too high in the front and gives me a uniboob. I really, really like these ones. Thank you Hanes for making them. I hope you keep making this style with the cotton blend. I cannot wear the acrylic polyester blend ones because I'm allergic to some materials.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Scheaffer

customer_reviews.title: Too small / sizing is WAY off, fabric too thin
customer_reviews.text: Material too thin, very small-bought a large I am a 36D and was suggested to buy a medium, it was extremely TIGHT!!! they say Hanes and came in a clear bag, no Hanes packaging or Hanes tag or marking on them whatsoever, was very disappointed;sent these back and went to the local Wal*Mart and ended up buying Fruit of the Loom, and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tristyn Coker

customer_reviews.title: Took 3 tries
customer_reviews.text: So, I had to order up 3 sizes! The size chart is so inaccurate. But, when I finally got a size I can live with, I am fairly satisfied. I hate wearing bras and have gone most of my life without them. The biggest issues were fit and the stupid straps. I am now a 38C and the XL fits pretty good, the material is soft, I don't feel squished, and the sports straps ensures they will stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect bra!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering several racerback sport bras and being disappointed I finally found one I love. I wanted an everyday comfortable bra I can both work out in and lounge around the house in. I'm a 36A/B and don't need a lot of support and mainly wanted a lightweight bra that breathes. This cotton blend is the answer. It's also well made and still supports in the right places. Going to order more colors.
customer_reviews.author: lucialarue

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sizing
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who designed this size chart, but I'm a size 38DD and it recommended a large for US cup and band size. They're way too small and they don't stretch at all! Very disappointing. I guess if you do buy these order or maybe two sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Bumble_Bee_101

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately ordered a medium which is way too small for me; fortunately, a family member tried it on and it fit and she said it was wonderful. If I order it again (for myself) I will order at least a large, maybe an extra-large. This is surprising to me since most of my tops measure a size medium. But, I believe if it had fit me, I would have immediately ordered more. My mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I have breathing problems and needed a non binding bra while working out. This bra is perfect. Full coverage, soft material and the size is perfect. It supports without being too tight. I ordered my clothing size and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: YaymeeT

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This bras fit as expected. They do not offer a great deal of support but are comfortable. The cups are double lined for modesty. The colors are great, that’s what caught my eye while looking for these. I’m a 42D and purchased the 2x and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly VanOver

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect - Now too loose under bust
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 36DD and these have been my around the house or sleeping bras in XL for awhile now. But it looks like they no longer work for me... my last 2 orders of XL have been a whole 2 inches too loose around the ribs (under the bust). I may try the L again but it was too small in the cup area and too tight under the bust when I tried previously. I'd hoped it was just a fluke with my last order this most recent one has made these officially unusable anymore. I have 6 old ones remaining of the XL that are still somewhat new. So I hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Not soft, stretchy, or comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The material is not very soft or stretchy. The band at the bottom, under your bust, is not great, and I find the whole bra disappointing and itchy. Hanes has really lost quality I feel like in recent years. I used to buy Hanes a LOT and loved their products, but just about everything I buy from Hanes now is simply disappointing and not comfortable, as you'd hope a cotton item would be.
customer_reviews.author: CattInTheHat

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wear 38-40 DD and these fit me perfectly and are very comfortable. If you are thinking these are a firm support like sports bras, they aren’t. At my size they are perfect to wear around the house or run quick errands. I love them and just ordered another set.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is wrong. Buy larger.
customer_reviews.text: According to the size chart, I take a size small. I couldn't even get it over my head. It would fit a tween as a training bra. I didn't expect much for the price but come on!! Send me a medium and a large if you want a good review.
customer_reviews.author: one last dance

customer_reviews.title: flattens you out a bit
customer_reviews.text: I use these as swimsuit tops in my pool. I also wear them as bras, but the shape they give you is not really attractive. I do like that they make me look like I've lost some weight. They are comfortable, the colors are nice and they wash up well. I have had them for some time and they have been washed many times, not to mention the chlorine hasn't faded them.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Stanek

customer_reviews.title: Comfortabke sleep bra.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use as sleep bras. Once I got the correct size, they were excellent for that purpose. The fabric is soft, they hold up to washing quite well, and they provide adequate support for sleep. I did have to return my original purchase and exchange for a larger size, because the size indicated by the chart in the product listing was too tight. I like the racerback style because the straps stay put no matter what position I am in.
customer_reviews.author: CDF

customer_reviews.title: NOT HANES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are not Hanes. I agree with the other reviewers. They have an odd odor. Came packaged in the same bag. One with a tag and one without. I bought 2 sets. XL and XXL. Returning the XL as its way small. Inaccurate size chart. Poor quality. I'm keeping the xxl because I need something to keep my boobs from going all over the place while sleeping. I'm a 38ddd. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this purchase. They smell like bug spray. I’m hoping when I wash them that the smell washes out. I do not recommend. I refuse to try them on when they smell like this. God only knows what chemical is in the material.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Farooqui

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a bra that I don't want to rip off of my body as soon as i get home! I was getting so tired of tugging and pulling at my other (more expensive) bras. These don't really do much to enhance your bust, but they do the job, they work even under a thin T-shirt. I ordered a size up, because most of the pullover bras seem to run small, at least on me. I like the back of these too. Not quite racerback, but suitable to wear under racerback and cut-out tanks. Need more colors.
customer_reviews.author: CindyE

customer_reviews.title: D-cup or above?  I don't recommend this bra.
customer_reviews.text: I've never worn a sports bra before but I'm pretty sure its supposed to provide support and limit bouncing. I suppose this does limit bouncing but it is not comfortable for me. I went by the recommended size. Maybe a size up would have been better but this bra didn't seem to support so much as smoosh my breasts against my chest to immobilize them.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonkitty

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive of DD, even for a sports bra.  Long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is a wear everyday, everywhere bra. It does not flatten as much as some and no monoboob. Overall this is a wonderful value and high quality item. The ones I bought 7 years are still wearable and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Cheeeap & basic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the two pack, one white, one black. I ordered up a size cause I’m pregnant. They are soo thin & cheap. The white one is basically see thru. I got them for ‘nipple containment’ but these will only work in warm weather if you get my drift. Wouldn’t buy again, not stretchy or comfy. But I guess they are about what you’d expect for five bucks each.
customer_reviews.author: texascutie

customer_reviews.title: Early pregnancy -game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently 6 weeks pregnant (through IVF) and full of fertility hormones. I’m at the point where I have to have some kind of support 24/7. This is WAY more comfortable to lounge and sleep in than a sports bra. I bought size small & wear a 32D at Victoria’s Secret. I feel like the band is just right/snug. any bigger I would definitely suggest a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these to replace several of the same brand and style that had literally fallen apart after 11 years. They held up great over the years but it was time for some new ones. I like these because there is no padding and they are super comfy. Great sports bra for the price, I was glad I found them on Amazon. I am a 34B so the medium is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a D cup
customer_reviews.text: Based on all the positive reviews, I had high expectations for these bras. I was very disappointed. This bra was more than an inch narrower and shorter than other size medium lounge bras I own from other brands. Since I am a 34D, this means that the band keeps sliding up under the ladies and flipping over. I tried washing and hanging them to dry to see if that altered their shape, but it didn’t. I also found the seams on the inside to be irritating to my skin. I bought two double packs. I’ll be returning the one I didn’t open.
customer_reviews.author: ABar

customer_reviews.title: Horrible chemical smell--very concerned!
customer_reviews.text: These had an extremely strong chemical smell--like they were soaked in disinfectant or bug spray. Never had that with a Hanes cotton product I have bought. Thinking it may wash out (which it didn't), I attempted to wash these in the sink before laundering (to rinse out the chemicals) and ended up breathing in a lot of this chemical and having respiratory irritation. I looked at 1-star reviews and saw that others had written about this and how some thought they might be counterfeit because of this and because they do not have a Hanes logo or name anywhere on them.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small
customer_reviews.text: These are ok for younger girls maybe. The material is cheap and that weird, unsoft cotton. They run really small. Hanes bras usually run a little small so I always order up a size. These don’t stretch much either.
customer_reviews.author: Apes

customer_reviews.title: Great bra. Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bra. Very comfortable!! I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it is very tight trying to get it on, but once it is on it is comfortable. The elastic is not super-stretchy so it feels tight trying to get it over my head and shoulders. I felt like it was going to rip. But once it's on, it is fine. It is comfy and keeps my girls secure. :)
customer_reviews.author: blondie507

customer_reviews.title: Don't size up with this one
customer_reviews.text: This bra is very large compared to the other 2X that I ordered. I wear a 38 C and the sport bras in the 2X size were none too big except for this one. It's very soft and cottony but loose in the band and my boobs fell out of it. It's a nice deal for two and I believe if you got the right size it could be a very comfortable bra.
customer_reviews.author: Swan Girl

customer_reviews.title: large is NOT large !
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36 DD and The large would fit someone who is more like a 34 B
customer_reviews.author: LC_NYC

customer_reviews.title: Not well made, not supportive at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 32F and just wanted something to wear around the house in the mornings that wasn't too constricting So this bra is GIANT, I got the Large and while it didn't fit all of me (spillage out the top and sides) it was also just far too loose I was hoping for a little more elastic support, I have camisoles that offer more support than these!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Dr

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I tried these after an injury when my sensitive skin couldn't stand the metal and stiffness of regular bras. So wonderfully comfortable. I can't say they give much of an uplift but I'm a petite and the straps on bras are always a bit too long for me. What they did do is a great job on minimizing and that was an unexpected plus for me. All the excess skin under my arms and on my back was comfortably contained and gave me a smooth look. I ordered my regular top size and the fit was perfect. Lots of stretch in these so they would accommodate several cup sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

product_meta.title: Hanes Women's Comfort-Blend Flex Fit Pullover Bra (2-Pack)
product_meta.description: This Hanes comfort blend bra gives you style and flexibility for low-impact sports. Cotton, spandex fabric that moves with you. Available in a convenient 2-pack
feature_bullets: Comfort flex fit 4-way stretch fabric provides a flexible fit that shapes to fit you
Easy to fit smart sizes shape to fit you
Sporty racer back, crop top styling
Low-impact support ideal for yoga or weight training
